Title: Constance Carmell Wedding
Plot: Constance is getting married and she's hired her Party Down friends to make sure they attend. Ron, guided by Constance's wisdom to 'follow your heart', makes a desperate bid for love.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Patrick Duffy, Jim Turner, Erick Avari, Alex Rocco, Michael Hitchcock, June Diane Raphael
